Heroics Cleared Checklist.name: Heroics Cleared Checklist
Heroics Cleared Checklist.description: This checklist tracks completion of all heroic quests across all planets. Heroics are challenging group content that require coordination and proper preparation.

Jedi Unlock Checklist.name: Jedi Unlock Checklist
Jedi Unlock Checklist.description: This checklist tracks the progression towards unlocking Jedi characters, including all prerequisites and requirements.

items.name: Reach Level 25
items.description: Minimum level required for Jedi unlock

Legacy Quest Checklist.name: Legacy Quest Checklist
Legacy Quest Checklist.description: This checklist tracks completion of legacy quests that are important for character progression and story content.

items.name: Janta Blood Collection
items.description: Collect Janta Blood from local wildlife

items.name: Ancient Artifact Hunt
items.description: Search for ancient artifacts in the ruins

items.name: Legendary Weapon Crafting
items.description: Craft a legendary weapon for the smith

items.name: Robe Delivery
items.description: Deliver robes to a customer in Theed

items.name: Masterwork Armor Crafting
items.description: Create masterwork armor for the crafter

items.name: Rare Crystal Mining
items.description: Mine rare crystals from the mountains

items.name: Precious Gem Trading
items.description: Trade precious gems with the merchant

items.name: Ancient Artifact Hunt
items.description: Search for ancient artifacts in the ruins

items.name: Valuable Scroll Delivery
items.description: Deliver valuable scrolls to the keeper

Mustafar Complete Checklist.name: Mustafar Complete Checklist
Mustafar Complete Checklist.description: This checklist tracks completion of all content available on Mustafar, including quests, collections, achievements, and exploration.

items.name: Lava Mining Operations
items.description: Establish mining operations in lava fields

items.name: Mustafar Explorer
items.description: Visit all major locations on Mustafar

items.name: Lava Walker
items.description: Survive in lava fields for extended periods

items.name: Crystal Hunter
items.description: Find all crystal types on Mustafar

Weapon Collection Checklist.name: Weapon Collection Checklist
Weapon Collection Checklist.description: This checklist tracks collection of all weapons available in the game, organized by type, rarity, and acquisition method.

items.name: Krayt Dragon Blade
items.description: Blade forged from Krayt Dragon parts

items.name: Palace Defender Rifle
items.description: Rifle used to defend Naboo Palace
